    Package index

    All functions

    FNCS()
    Compute the Field Normalized Citation Score (FNCS) and Percentage Rank (FNPR) of a publication
    ecdf2()
    ecdf2
    evenness_index()
    Evenness Index function
    get_BIP()
    Retrieve BIP scores for a list of DOIs
    get_JIF()
    Compute the Journal Impact Factor
    get_network()
    Get network analysis of co-authorships for a given author or set of works
    get_reference_set()
    Get a reference set for field normalized citation rates
    get_reference_set_from_files()
    Helper function: Get reference set from files
    h_index()
    Compute h-index and hIa-index
    normalize_ORCIDs()
    Normalize ORCIDs
    normalize_dois()
    Normalize DOIs
    upper_trim_mean()
    Calculates the upper trimmed mean of a vector
